name: Reeding Blast
description:
Reeding Blast, once complete, will be a game where the universe is in your hands.  Eventually you shall be able to build your empire, defeat space pirates, scavenge for treasure and build expansive bases in distant worlds.

For now, the game is less exciting.  We are actively working on this project, to bring the previously mentioned features.  Here is what we have so far:

New in Beta 7:

* Helper NPC added (Found on Earth)

* Improved Controls

* Main Menu Improvements

* Fixed Balance display bug.
